name: Fay's Factory (itch)
description:
The magical industrial revolution is here. Everybody wants to be a sorcerer, but most people just work at the spell-producing factories. And hey, guess what — you are in the most part.

Build factories, fight duels, explore the reactive world, argue with capitalists and communists, and see if this world is worth starting a working class revolution over.

strategy/rpg

coming 2022

your feedback and questions go here: discord.gg/MeMD6vGZbm

(this is a demo! about 1.5h of content)
